title: Subpart 3-4 - INVESTMENT CAPITAL AND INVESTMENT INCOME
content:
Subpart 3-4 - INVESTMENT CAPITAL AND INVESTMENT INCOME
State Regulations
§ 3-4.1 - Definition of investment capital
§ 3-4.2 - Constitutionally protected investment capital
§ 3-4.3 - Investment capital identification procedures
§ 3-4.4 - Presumed investment capital that fails the holding period requirement
§ 3-4.5 - Definition of investment income
§ 3-4.6 - Definition of other exempt income
§ 3-4.7 - Attribution of interest deductions

§ 3-4.9 - [Repealed]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
